comment: Tasted while in Brooklyn; didn't make the cut to buy a bottle
Good whiskey, not entirely smooth follow but not bad
a little harsh at first, water helped bring out the flavors
One of my go-to's, versatile with brunch, before or after dinner or just sipping and watching the hockey game.
I actually liked this, it’s definitely a unique flavor. Almost a hint of banana on the front, but not like Jack Daniels, sweeter than that. Wheat comes through and it’s pretty good.
A smooth and easy drink with little flavor in the begin but ends with a great after-taste which makes this one of my go too whiskeys.
